Text: i cant get it to play audio man
You should tell clearly that after downloading user must BURN DVD. I do not have DVD drive and was VERY dissapointed when i finished downloading.

You don't have to burn it, you just need software that play's files like that...  I like PowerISO but there are others.  There's lot's of stuff everyone has to learn to use downloaded material.  
Google it!

Oh and for the sound you probably need a codec.  

www.cccp-project.net  This codec pack should fix you up.

And use VLC Video Player too.  It's the best.
Cannot confirm the movie yet, will as soon as i have it downloaded. But I can confirm that cccp thing works like a charm!! Been looking for ages for something like that.
Great movie and quality, worth downloading!
